ANZ 2023

March 2023

The ANZ Serverless Community Together!

G'day! Kia ora!

In March 2023 the Australian and New Zealand serverless communities are looking at running an in-person event.

We expect to hold the event in Melbourne, Australia with venue details to follow

Submit a talk

Our Call for Papers is currently open, so head to Sessionize to find out more and submit your talk. We are looking for intermediate / advanced topics and are happy to help if you need support to submit a talk.

Sponsor

Help us help as many community members as we can to attend through low ticket prices with great speakers and venue. Interested in helping through sponsoring? Check out our sponsorship page.

Register interest to attend

If you'd like us to notify you when tickets go on sale please complete the form below.
